select arc.da_id,arc.da_deviceId,arc.da_device_address,arc.da_device_version,arc.da_cmt_address, arc.da_sys_name,arc.da_sys_type,arc.da_sys_version, arc.da_state,arc.da_device_mfgInfo,arc.da_createTime,arc.da_editTime,arc.da_device_type, dev.dld_devStatus_num from t_device_archives arc JOIN t_device_link_dev dev on dev.dld_device_id=arc.da_deviceId where 1=1
and arc.da_deviceId like "%"#{req.deviceId}"%"
and arc.da_device_type like "%"#{req.deviceType}"%"
and arc.da_device_version like "%"#{req.deviceVersion}"%"
and arc.da_device_mfgInfo like "%"#{req.deviceMfginfo}"%"
and arc.da_cmt_address like "%"#{req.cmtAddress}"%"
and dev.dld_devStatus_num =#{req.linkStatusNum}

select arc.da_id,arc.da_deviceId,arc.da_device_address,arc.da_device_version,arc.da_cmt_address, arc.da_sys_name,arc.da_sys_type,arc.da_sys_version, arc.da_state,arc.da_device_mfgInfo,arc.da_createTime,arc.da_editTime,arc.da_device_type, dev.dld_devStatus_num from t_device_task dta left join t_device_archives arc on arc.da_id=dta.dt_arcId left join t_device_upgrade_task uta on dta.dt_taId=uta.dut_id left join t_device_link_dev dev on arc.da_deviceId=dev.dld_device_id where uta.dut_exceState=1
and arc.da_deviceId like "%"#{req.deviceId}"%"
and arc.da_device_type like "%"#{req.deviceType}"%"
and arc.da_device_version like "%"#{req.deviceVersion}"%"
and arc.da_device_mfgInfo like "%"#{req.deviceMfginfo}"%"
and arc.da_cmt_address like "%"#{req.cmtAddress}"%"
and arc.da_sys_name like "%"#{req.sysName}"%"
and dev.dld_devStatus_num =#{req.linkStatusNum}
and uta.dut_type = #{req.upgradeType}
